snippet: Edward Cheserek of St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark had his first loss of the season at the National High School Indoor Track and Field Championships at the Armory in Upper Manhattan.
abstract: Utah high schooler Brad Nye wins mile race in 4 minutes 8.67 seconds at National High School Indoor Track and Field Championships; it is first loss of season for Edward Cheserek of St Benedict's Prep in Newark, but Cheserek captures the two-mile in 8:50.53.
lead_paragraph: Edward Cheserek of St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark had his first loss of the season at the National High School Indoor Track and Field Championships at the Armory in Upper Manhattan.
